price: Anuncia a los hipócritas que recibirán un castigo doloroso.
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
